data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Utah, United States that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Utah, United States
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Utah, United States so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Utah.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Utah, United States to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Arab, Iraqi people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Utah.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Utah, United States.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Utah, United States the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.
